data.eml:eml: Description of Almafuerte, a new genus of ground spiders from South America (Araneae, Gnaphosidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grismado, Cristian J., Carrión, Nicolás López (2017): Description of Almafuerte, a new genus of ground spiders from South America (Araneae, Gnaphosidae). Zootaxa 4338 (2): 263-291, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4338.2.3
